Row.Text: Combat victories generate [ICON_Science] science equal to the defeted unit's [ICON_Strength] combat strength. +1[ICON_Strength] Combat Strength against major civilizations for every technology or civic you are ahead of your most advanced oponent, +1[ICON_Strength] Combat Strength for every 10[ICON_Science] or [ICON_Culture] you are ahead of them. Goes up to +8[ICON_Strength] Combat Strength, can give negative [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength if you are behind. +5[ICON_Strength] Combat Strength agains barbarians. International [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade routes to URQUIZAS give +2[ICON_Gold] to the sender, +1[ICON_Science] and +1[Icon_Culture] get added with the discovery of Scientific Theory

URQUIZAS's unique replacement for the library providing +1[ICON_Science] science for every 4[ICON_Citizen] Citizens in the city, up to +10[ICON_Science]. Has 2[ICON_GREATWORK_WRITING] great work of writing slots and 1 for great works of any type. Every time an International [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Route arrives at a city with a Biblioteca POPULARISSIMO either a [ICON_Citizen] Citizen on the city, an [ICON_TechBoosted] Eureka or an [ICON_CivicBoosted] Inspiration will be given at random
